title: The travel ban: a cause without a reason
text:
According to various news sources, each year approximately 60,000 Americans die from drug overdoses, 33,000 from gunshots, and 32,000 in car accidents. Meanwhile, one American — that’s right, one per year — is killed by foreign-born terrorists.

Now the Supreme Court has ruled that a limited version of President Trump’s ban on travel from six Muslim-dominated countries can take effect.

Trump is more interested in keeping campaign promises than in keeping Americans safe.

Don Mallinson

East Falmouth
summary:
According to various news sources, each year approximately 60,000 Americans die from drug overdoses, 33,000 from gunshots, and 32,000 in car accidents.
Meanwhile, one American — that’s right, one per year — is killed by foreign-born terrorists.
Now the Supreme Court has ruled that a limited version of President Trump’s ban on travel from six Muslim-dominated countries can take effect.
Trump is more interested in keeping campaign promises than in keeping Americans safe.
Don MallinsonEast Falmouth
